languages.text: {n}Наконец Муаран склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Я не готов рисковать своими братьями, мон-кай. Скреплю душу и попробую поверить твоему обещанию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Наконец Муаран склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Я не готов рисковать своими братьями, мон-кай. Скреплю душу и попробую поверить твоему обещанию".

languages.text: {n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my kin's lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."
languages.original_text: {n}Наконец Муаран склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Я не готов рисковать своими братьями, мон-кай. Скреплю душу и попробую поверить твоему обещанию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Finally, Ulrahn tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my brothers' lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."
{n}Finally, Ulrahn tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my brothers' lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."
{n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my brothers' lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."
{n}Finally, Ulrahn tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my brothers' lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."
{n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my brothers' lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."
{n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my brothers' lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."

languages.text: {n}到了最后，穆兰歪了歪头。{/n}“我不打算拿族人的生命去冒险，猴子。我会坚定我的灵魂，努力去相信你的承诺。”
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my kin's lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}到了最后，穆兰歪了歪头。{/n}“我不打算拿我兄弟们的生命去冒险，猴子。我会坚定我的灵魂，努力去相信你的承诺。”

languages.text: {n}ついにムアランがうなずく。{/n}「私は同胞の命を脅かすつもりはないぞ、モン＝ケイ。情を排してこの魂を鋼で覆い、お前の約束を信じてみよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my kin's lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}ついにムアランがうなずく。{/n}「私は同胞の命を脅かすつもりはないぞ、モン＝ケイ。情を排してこの魂を鋼で覆い、お前の約束を信じてみよう」

languages.text: {n}Schließlich legt Muaran den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Ich bin nicht bereit, das Leben meiner Brüder und Schwestern zu riskieren, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich werde meine Seele festigen und versuchen, Eurem Versprechen zu glauben."
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my kin's lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schließlich legt Muaran den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Ich bin nicht bereit, das Leben meiner Brüder zu riskieren, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich werde meine Seele festigen und versuchen, Eurem Versprechen zu glauben."

languages.text: {n}Muaran finit par reprendre la parole en penchant la tête.{/n} « Je refuse de risquer la vie des miens, mon-keigh. Je vais puiser dans la force de mon âme pour essayer de croire en votre promesse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my kin's lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran finit par reprendre la parole en penchant la tête.{/n} « Je refuse de risquer la vie de mes frères, mon-keigh. Je vais puiser dans la force de mon âme pour essayer de croire en votre promesse. »

languages.text: {n}Finalmente, Muaran inclina la cabeza.{/n} «No estoy dispuesto a poner en riesgo las vidas de mi gente, mon-keigh. Haré acopio de voluntad y trataré de creer en tu promesa».
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my kin's lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Finalmente, Muaran inclina la cabeza.{/n} «No estoy dispuesto a poner en riesgo las vidas de mis hermanos, mon-keigh. Haré acopio de voluntad y trataré de creer en tu promesa».

languages.text: {n}Nihayet Muaran başını eğiyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarımın canını riske etmeye gönlüm razı değil mon-keigh. Bağrıma taş basıp sözüne inanmaya çalışacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Muaran tilts his head.{/n} "I am not willing to risk my kin's lives, mon-keigh. I will steel my soul and try to believe your promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihayet Muaran başını eğiyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarımın canını riske etmeye gönlüm razı değil mon-keigh. Bağrıma taş basıp sözüne inanmaya çalışacağım."
